Articles.Content:
Why hello there.

As you can see by my post count, I\'m quite green on these boards.

Please be gentle, you guys~~!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

You know what I wanna see in a future update?

Persistent ground damage. As in, when you crash (intentionally or not), you leave nice gaping craters on the surface of whatever you happened to crash in! One that lasts from mission to mission!
